name: AVMusicTrack
desc: A collection of music events that you can offset, set to a muted state, modify independently from other track events, and send to a specified destination.

items.name: var destinationAudioUnit: AVAudioUnit?
items.desc: The audio unit that receives the track’s events.

items.name: var destinationMIDIEndpoint: MIDIEndpointRef
items.desc: The MIDI endpoint you specify as the track’s target.

items.name: var lengthInBeats: AVMusicTimeStamp
items.desc: The total duration of the track, in beats.

items.name: var lengthInSeconds: TimeInterval
items.desc: The total duration of the track, in seconds.

items.name: var loopRange: AVBeatRange
items.desc: The timestamp range for the loop, in beats.

items.name: var isLoopingEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the track is in a looping state.

items.name: var isMuted: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the track is in a muted state.

items.name: var numberOfLoops: Int
items.desc: The number of times the track’s loop repeats.

items.name: var offsetTime: AVMusicTimeStamp
items.desc: The offset of the track’s start time, in beats.

items.name: var isSoloed: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the track is in a soloed state.

items.name: var timeResolution: Int
items.desc: The time resolution value for the sequence, in ticks (pulses) per quarter note.
